root.name: Ragdoll Blaster 2
root.description: "The Ragdolls are back and ready for more physics puzzle action" Ragdoll Blaster 2 is the sequel of the highly addictive and fun game, ragdoll blaster. This game lets you take control over an cannon, with the cannon you shoot ragdolls. With these ragdolls you need to complete puzzels, which are based on ice, gravity, teleporting and "Ragdoll spam" The game is highly awarded for it's excellent physics, which makes the puzzle solving progress even more fun then the first one. Ragdoll Blaster 2 uses the Plus network, this means you can unlock achievement and invite friends trough facebook and twitter. it also has an online leaderboard for the competitive players.
